text:
BREAKING NEWS. Voting 284-9-0, House approves on 3rd reading HB 6616, which would declare a state of national emergency and also grant President Duterte with 25 special powers to address the COVID-19 pandemic. #COVID19PH | via @maracepeda 

Details soon on https://t.co/xRifPLHRsK https://t.co/PPjzHkAWa3
